alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 12:26AM CST until February 27 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Doniphan County in northeastern Kansas... Northwestern Leavenworth County in northeastern Kansas... Atchison County in northeastern Kansas... Southwestern Buchanan County in northwestern Missouri... Northwestern Platte County in west central Missouri... * Until 100 AM CST. * At 1226 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hoyt to Meriden to near Berryton, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atchison, Highland, Effingham, Rushville, Lancaster, Easton, Muscotah, Denton, Lewis And Clark Village, Doniphan, Severance, Farmington, Huron, Leona, Iatan, Arrington, Bean Lake, Lewis And Clark Vi, Bendena and Lowemont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
